roleset.name: pass on to a successor

example.name: devolve-v: All arguments
example.text: The representative devolved his duties to his aides while he was in the hospital.
example.arg: while he was in the hospital.

example.name: devolve-v: middle voice
example.text: The estate devolved to an heir that everybody had assumed to be dead.
example.arg: to an heir that everybody had assumed to be dead.

example.name: devolve-v: without recipient
example.text: The Vatican is in no hurry to devolve power.

example.name: devolve-v: passive
example.text: Certain powers were devolved from central government in London to other parts of the UK.
example.arg: to other parts of the UK.

example.name: devolution-n
example.text: But even in the absence of bad policy, devolution of land to the states or, better still, to private owners is a matter of republican principle
example.arg: to the states or, better still, to private owners

roleset.note: DEVOLVE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls future_having-13.3. Comparison to 'bequeath'. (from devolve.01-v)

roleset.name: grow worse

example.src: Classic example with patient and end state
example.name: devolve-v: Classic example with patient and end state
example.text: I've seen [one too many angry blog discussions]-1 devolve *trace*-1 into "You're calling me racist!"

example.src: Patient, start state and end state
example.name: devolve-v: Patient, start state and end state
example.text: [The species concept debate]-1 has devolved *trace*-1 from an empirical discussion into a philosophical one.

roleset.note: DEVOLVE-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. No Vncls. Comparison to 'transform'. (from devolve.02-v)
This always appears with Arg 2 "into__" or possibly "to__". Agent not seen in data, and may never occur. (from devolve.02-v)
